resources.string: Hi, iSMS is a cool chatting tool. It is free and convenient. Please check http://isms.hissage.com to find more.
SD card is not detected, some operations won\'t be allowed by iSMS
SD card is available for use
Unable to send the message. It will be sent automatically once network is available.
Unable to download. Please try again later.
Please make sure you have a working data connection, e.g., 3G, GPRS or Wi-Fi
SIM card is not detected, you must insert a SIM card.
Network is not available or flight mode is on, please check.
Upgrade error, please upgrade in iSMS client
iSMS will send a onetime SMS to verify your phone number. Carrier charge may apply.
Please make sure your phone number is entered correctly.
Please make sure you have a working SMS plan.
Waiting to automatically detect an SMS sent to
Thank you for activating iSMS.\n You can now start to enjoy the service.\nHappy iSMS!
Set a ringtone for new notifications
Save in SD card in zip format
E-Mail chat history in zip format
Downloading chat history is done, save it as %s
Save this chat thread to SD card as a zip file
Share this chat thread as attachment via E-Mail in zip format
No applications can perform this action.
Sorry, failed to save profile image.

This feature is only supported by iSMS service.

iSMS is a free instant messaging service which allows you to chat and share multimedia content with your friends at anytime and anyplace via internet data connection(Wi-Fi, 2G/3G, etc.).
When activate for the first time, iSMS will send out an SMS automatically to complete the registration. SMS quota/fee may apply.

 User Agreement

iSMS is a free instant messaging service which allows you to chat and share multimedia content with your friends at anytime and anyplace via internet data connection(Wi-Fi, 2G/3G, etc.).
When activate for the first time, iSMS will send out an SMS automatically to complete the registration. SMS quota/fee may apply.

 User Agreement
No SIM card is activated or enabled.

You understand that the Service and software embodied within the Service may include security components that permit digital materials to be protected, and that use of these materials is subject to usage rules set by AF PushMail and/or content providers who provide content to the Service. You may not attempt to override or circumvent any of the usage rules embedded into the Service. Any unauthorized reproduction, publication, further distribution or public exhibition of the materials provided on the Service, in whole or in part, is strictly prohibited.
iSMS is a nice communication tool free of charge. Learn more
Send as SMS when iSMS is unavailable. Carrier messaging rates may apply. This rule does not apply to group chat

Send
WIFI: %1$.3f K		GPRS: %2$.3f K

 Receive 
WIFI: %3$.3f K		GPRS: %4$.3f K

 Last time empty: %5$s

Send
WIFI: %1$.3f K
GPRS SIM1: %2$.3f K
GPRS SIM2: %3$.3f K

 Receive
WIFI: %4$.3f K
GPRS SIM1: %5$.3f K
GPRS SIM2: %6$.3f K

 Last time empty: %7$s
Show read status in message list
Show iSMS Reminders in chat screen

Map cannot be displayed because your location service is not turned on. The address below is estimated based on you cell information. \nTo have a more accurate location service, it is suggested to turn on location service.
Please enable a My Location source in system settings
Input character has reached the limit
Please make sure your Location service is turned on, and the network is available
Unable to get latitude and longitude
Failed to load, please try again later
The media will be deleted, continue?
Do you want to clear this sketch?
Are you sure to leave sketching?
Are you sure to drop this sketch?
Do you want to leave from this group?
Do you want to discard this operation?
Do you want to remove this from list?
You have left from this group chat.
This feature is only supported by iSMS service. Enable your iSMS account now?
Group chat is only supported when iSMS service is activated, but the current SIM card is not activated. Switch to the SIM card activated?
Current SIM card is not associated with this group. Switch to the other SIM card?
You have left this group and cannot join this group chat unless you are invited again
The original chat SIM card has been removed, you can only chat in this group with your original SIM card
To forward the iSMS, you need to download the media content firstly.
To do the multi-forward, some iSMS needs to be downloaded firstly.
Are you sure you want to delete this important message?
The selected messages will be deleted.
All chat history will be cleared in this chat room
The SD card cannot be accessed.All multimedia related features are temporarily unavailable to use.\n\nPlease check your SD card and try again later.
SD card is not detected, can\'t save file
SD card available space is not enough, can\'t save file.
To continue group chatting, switch to %1$s SIM first.
To continue group chatting, turn on iSMS service on %1$s SIM first.
There is an existing attachment, replace?
Failed to fetch contact by Id
There are no group chat members
The group chat is not activated
The group chat SIM card is not the current SIM card
This group chat is not there anymore
Fail to create group. Members shall not contain yourself
Number of group members reaches the limit
The group chat\'s SIM card is not activated
Failed to get download file name
The download file does not exist
The system is busy, and can\'t deal with system configuration command
Recipient is not an iSMS user, send by MMS?
With iSMS, you can instantly deliver free messages, and keeps your chat history in one place, Press on one button, comes the new experience!

You don't have any spam conversation. 
SPAM collects all conversations that are marked as spam. Notification will be turned off by default. This avoid you from unnecessary disturbance. 

You can mark a sender as spam by holding a conversation and selecting Mark as Spam icon. When a conversation is marked as spam, a notification-off icon will be shown automatically and the conversation will be placed here.
This is an example of spam message.

You don't have any group chat message. 
GROUP CHATS collects all group chat messages that are created or joined by you. This allows you find and manage your group chats easily. 

To create a group chat, you can tap on Create a group chat button at the bottom of this screen and invite your friends to join the group.
Your friend:\nI like group chat feature!

You don't have any important message. 
IMPORTANT collects all the messages that are flagged as important. This allows you find important messages easily. 

You can flag a message as important by holding a message and selecting Flag as important from Option menu. When a message is flagged as important, you will see a red flag icon as below.
This is an example of a message flagged as important. A red flag will appear.
To use this feature. you will have to activate iSMS service first. Don\'t worry - if you don\'t like the service, you can always turn off in Settings. Try it out now!
The size of file exceeds the limit
The operation failed, please try again
The operation failed, please try again
You have successfully activated iSMS service
You have successfully inactivated iSMS service
iSMS service is unavailable temporarily as the space is not enough.
The remaining memory space is not enough to send multimedia messages.
Succeeded: %1$d messages\n Failed: %2$d messages\n Continue to forward successfully downloaded messages?
iSMS is unavailable temporarily as the remaining mobile memory space is not enough. You may restart iSMS after the memory space is recovered.
The burn after reading message cannot be viewed as it is not supported by the receiver\'s version.
The iSMS service of the current SIM card has not been activated yet; please switch to another SIM card before continuing the service.
Chat frequently with %s ?\nWhy not invite %s to use iSMS to save both of your money?
The iSMS service of %s is disabled!\nWhy not enable your iSMS service and save both of your money?
Are you sure to enble iSMS service?
Chat frequently with friends?\nWhy not activate iSMS service to chat without SMS rate?
Are you sure to activate iSMS?
Are you sure to dismiss the note?
iSMS service is not avaliable in this selected SIM card. This message can only be sent via MMS in this SIM card. Continue anyway?
iSMS service is not avaliable in this selected SIM card. This message can only be sent via SMS in this SIM card. Continue anyway?
The recipient(s) is(are) not iSMS user. This message can only be sent via MMS. Continue anyway?
The recipient(s) is(are) not iSMS user. This message can only be sent via SMS. Continue anyway?
iSMS service is avaliable in this selected SIM card. To save SMS rate, it is suggested switch the message to iSMS. Switch now?
iSMS service is avaliable in this selected SIM card. To save MMS rate, it is suggested switch the message to iSMS. Switch now?
To resend the message, your current composing message will be discarded.
"No working internet connection is found! Please try again later."
All chat history will be cleared in this chat room
Messages marked as Spam will move to Spam list and be turned off the notification automatically.
To send an invitation, your composing messages will be discarded.
This feature is only supported by iSMS service. Activate your iSMS account now?
This feature is only supported by iSMS service. Enable your iSMS account now?
The current SIM does not support iSMS. Switch to other SIM?
There is no recipient(s) for forwarding message
There is no message(s) can be forwarded
Please specify at least one recipient first

You don't have any spam conversation. 
SPAM collects all conversations that are marked as spam. Notification will be turned off by default. This avoid you from unnecessary disturbance. 

You can mark a sender as spam by holding a conversation and selecting Mark as Spam icon. When a conversation is marked as spam, a notification-off icon will be shown automatically and the conversation will be placed here.

You don't have any group chat message. 
GROUP CHATS collects all group chat messages that are created or joined by you. This allows you find and manage your group chats easily. 

To create a group chat, you can tap on Create a group chat button at the bottom of this screen and invite your friends to join the group.

You don't have any important message. 
IMPORTANT collects all the messages that are flagged as important. This allows you find important messages easily. 

You can flag a message as important by holding a message and selecting Flag as important from Option menu. When a message is flagged as important, you will see a red flag icon as below.
To do the multi-forward, some iSMS needs to be downloaded firstly.

iSMS is a software providing free SMS sending service. As long as you and your friend are both iSMS users, the exchange of messages, photos, videos and other multimedia information between you will be free of charge.
Thank you for activating iSMS service. You may get started now.
The receiver is not an iSMS user; this function is only available when both sender and receiver are iSMS users.
The message will be successfully delivered when the receiver gets online.
Note: Please remember the password, otherwise, you cannot open the private messages.
Self-define the notification title of private messages
Self-define the notification content of private messages
Are you sure to delete the contact?
Add private contact to protect the message privacy between you and your contact.
This message can only be sent via SMS as the receiver\'s iSMS is unavailable now. Do you want to continue?
This message can only be sent via MMS as the receiver\'s iSMS is unavailable now. Do you want to continue?
Unable to edit, Not default SMS app.
Some operations won\'t be allowed by iSMS
Can\'t compose, Not default SMS app.
